message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at $11,500. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $11,000 to make this a win-win. This product is truly worth it, and I believe you'll see a significant return on your investment.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,800?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,800 is cutting it very close to my bottom line. I'm willing to accept $10,900 as my final offer. This is a fair price considering the value this product will bring you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,800?
